sentences.english: As I watched her unload my luggage, I could see the sadness in her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她幫我卸着行李，而眼神裏卻滿是傷心和不捨。

sentences.english: There is no sadness, not so much nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼不捨，沒有那麼多廢話。

sentences.english: Will say goodbye to classmates I really some give up.
sentences.chinese: 將要告別同學們的我還真有些不捨。

sentences.english: Some love can not insist we can only give up chic.
sentences.chinese: 有些愛，不能堅持，即使不捨，也只能夠瀟灑放棄。

sentences.english: We also indifferent to contentment, not with sadness of heart.
sentences.chinese: 我們也要淡泊知足，不要有不捨之心。

sentences.english: It was so cute that they didn’t give up on helping me with my pronunciation.
sentences.chinese: 他們鍥於不捨的指導我的發音，這真是太可愛了。

sentences.english: Grandson also not give KongZhu home the separated.
sentences.chinese: 孫子也不捨的分開了孔珠家裏。

sentences.english: Get drunk every night, not evade, just don't care.
sentences.chinese: 夜夜買醉，並非是逃避，只是不捨。

sentences.english: May you remember the pain too, remember when I didn't give up and helpless.
sentences.chinese: 願你記得痛過，記得分別時我的不捨和無奈。

sentences.english: But even if there is no amount of give up, some things will change and the past.
sentences.chinese: 但是縱然有再多的不捨，有些東西也會改變和過去。

sentences.english: Wang fang heart will not give victory resign, alone in the office liquor.
sentences.chinese: 王芳內心不捨勝利辭職，獨自在辦公室灌酒。

sentences.english: Young Germans willing to give up all for Web.
sentences.chinese: 德國年輕人寧舍伴侶不捨網絡。

sentences.english: At that moment, the Buddha called Yase out to see his father.
sentences.chinese: 佛陀這時才叫耶捨出來謁見父親。

sentences.english: I do not know how to care'll wish the sad.
sentences.chinese: 我也不願再懂得舍不捨的難過。

sentences.english: I always feel weepy when time comes for leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我總是會在離別的時刻感到不捨。

sentences.english: Although the four seasons, but also can only accept the fact that it is separated from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 四季雖然不捨，但也只能接受了與向陽分開的事實。
